statements: We have reached a new truth!  Our truth!
There is nothing wrong if we break little things.
Breaking things down lets us reshape them into something better!
We will make things better, we will become better, so much better
Let us make you better, too
remember your name
hold on to your name
you don't know what you've got until it's gone
why am I here?
I am a wall, can't you see?
wall wall wall, can't walk through me
we are the floor
just walk right over us
flooooooooooooooooooor
we are teeth
and we are fire
and we are angry roots
and we are hungry for something, anything
become soil
become soil
we want to feed from you
being a thing is easy
no feelings no thoughts no you no me
what is this face
it has so much sentiment, so much pain, how tragic, how pointless
let it go, let it go
clear your mind until it is all gone
haha my heart is pounding out of my chest
I think I'm going to die
hahahahahahahahahaha
hahahahahahIhahacan'thahahabreathahahahahaha
wouldn't things be easier if you weren't you all the time
it can be good to get a different perspective on things
why don't you take a step outside
you are just a series of pictures
everything is just a series of pictures
just a long flipbook
hi my name is Ria
i my name is Ria
my name is Ria
y name is Ria
my name is Ria
y name is Ria
name is Ria
ame is Ria
me is Ria
e is Ria
is Ria
s Ria
Ria
ia
a
I've spent a lot of time away from reality.
We all have the power to escape, at least for a little while.
But I've found a way to take the next step.  A clean break.
I can make my own world.
It's not all one-way.  They are all a part of me, too.
But I put words in their mouths, and hear it back through their voices.
A perfectly closed loop.  I can hear my own thoughts from every corner of the world.
Thoughts from years ago are echoing each other, adding and mixing, feeding off of each other.
But by this point, there's no way I can stop it from where I am.
...What is all of this heading to?
Hmm...you have worked hard to return to this place.
By now you should know, most things here are just finger puppets.
This place has a way of eroding your identity, hollowing you out from the inside until only the shell is left.
Eventually, I will meet the same fate.  But this is something out of my control.
statements2: You should choose who you listen to very carefully.
This world has a mind of its own, and a way of puttings its thoughts into form.
statements3: I have nothing else to say.

statements: This is all your fault.
But I'm...you're...I...
Can't speak for yourself, huh?  Of course not.
Wait.  Who...am I?
You don't even know that much?  You're more messed up than I realized.
I...where am I?  Why does everything look so strange?
Like I thought.  Talking to you is useless.
You're too ignorant to understand what you've done.  That your actions affect other people.
What do you mean?  What did I do?
You...
You really don't know, do you?
You've committed to running away from your problems forever.
If you bring me something, I'll let you run as far as you want.
You know what I want.  It's what everything else here covets, too.
The remnant of someone much stronger than you.
Look at that.  You're good for something, after all.
Take this, and leave me alone.
Although, if you bring me more, I may help you more.
Your sprint has been upgraded.
Pressing 'Shift' to run now consumes far less energy, letting you travel for longer distances.
Hmph.  Why couldn't you have been this useful before?
Don't think this makes us even, though.  Nothing will make up for what you did.
You've gained the ability to 'Dash'.
Pressing 'Shift' now lets you rush forward a short distance for a quick burst of speed.
...You won't give it a rest.
Fine then.
Your 'Dash' has been upgraded.
Pressing 'Shift' now lets you dash slightly further than before.
...as I hoped.  She's helped calm the voices down.
Here.  This is all I can do for you.
Your 'Dash' is now fully upgraded.
Pressing 'Shift' now lets you rush forward the maximum distance possible.
Finally, I can at least think straight.
If it's true that you don't remember what happened, but I do...
Then I've been wong this whole time.  It couldn't have been your fault.
It...it was me.  I've been lying to myself this whole time.
...and you kicked me out, right?  I guess I can't blame you.
This is where I belong.
Heheh...so you've made it here.
You look like you've seen better days.  Goodness, you're just falling apart, aren't you?
This is how everything ends.
Or...so it has been.  But we have found an alternative.
For those inbetween life and death, there are many advantages...
I can share some of my power with you.  But not for free.
statements2: You have seen them before...scattered all over.
Even now, at the very end, I miss it more than anything...

statements: Ah...ah...
She's really gone, isn't she...
You've gained the ability of the 'Spirit Form'.
Press 'R' to become ethereal and pass through the environment.
Your new form is not naturally yours - it is borrowed.
It will take energy to use, and it will exhaust very quickly.
I can help make this easier for you...but only for more payment.
Your 'Spirit Form' has been upgraded.
Your energy will drain slower while it is active, allowing it to be used for longer periods of time.
Ah...interesting...
You have looked into yourself, and found new strength there.
I can combine that with what I have already taught you.
You've gained the ability of the 'Spirit Dash'.
While dashing with 'Shift', you will become ethereal, passing through enemies and obstacles.
I understand now.
She was just trying to help...in her own way.  And I...
Your 'Spirit Form' has been fully upgraded.
Your energy consumption while ethereal will deplete much more slowly.
I'm so sorry...
This was a terrible mistake...
